website_summaries.verdict: A good bed for small children and young adults who want a sturdy frame and unique headboard.
pros: Large sides make this a stable bed frame to hold a mattress in place
Legs keep the bed from sliding around on hardwood surfaces, preventing damage
Headboard provides a great focal point in traditionally design spaces
cons: Some customers found that the bed started breaking within months

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble if you read the instructions. Sturdy and no damage to wood. All of the holes lined up and my son loves it. I will add, if you have a twin memory foam mattress, that it will be a tight fit but it does fit. Great buy!! Update: 1 year later, it’s still in great shape. Still sturdy and doesn’t wobble a bit after a years worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It fit my son's Zinus memory foam 12 inch matress. I saw the bad reviews and I doubt about buying it at first. Thank God I did buy it. Only 2 things: 1- If you follow directions and do not use a power drill nothing breaks. We did not use it and the bed came out perfect without any damages. 2- You have to have patience because it does take time to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: this very nice bed and very easy to assemble just my daughter helped me took about 1 hour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ...Horrible cheap product/ extremely expensive to return
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY....This product is cheap particle board that would not have lasted 1 day for my boys. There is no wood about this product so the description is misleading. It might be a step up from card board. And the return expenses come out of your own pocket with a 20% restocking fee on top of that. Talk about not standing by your product and I totally see why. This is garbage. Do not waste your money and I will not be purchasing from the seller Bulk Business Prices And Promotions or Buy More and Save. They listed both as names.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: REVIEW UPDATED FEB 2020 Beware sharp edges!  Several injuries!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my children. Beds seem decent and nice but the corners and edges are very sharp. We have experienced several injuries in just a couple weeks. If you purchase these you will need to cover the corners and edges with something to prevent injury. REVIEW UPDATE FEB 2020: Its barely been 1 year and 1 of the 2 beds has completely fallen apart. Very poor quality. We are replacing both beds this weekend with beds that dont injure or fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it. One thing I was disappointed in is ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. One thing I was disappointed in is that the back of the headboard is the unfinished wood. So if you are wanting to put this somewhere where the headboard is not against a wall (which is what we were going to do), it won't work, or it may work, it just will look horrible with the unfinished wood showing. Or maybe that is just a personal preference. To each their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous beds for my boys as they have grown. This bed for my 3 year old was awesome. Weight was ridiculous as far as the box was concerned but once opened it was easy to assemble. Instructions had some humor to break the time up nicely. Sturdy bed with supports in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Account Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted for our toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We have two for our twins! Easy to put together, didn’t take too long, low to the floor, and very sturdy! They look so nice in their room! My twins were 20 months when we started using them and it is easy for them to climb in and out! They are strong enough for both kids, baby, and parents to sit on to read stories at bedtime!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids and they have had them for 2 years now and theyre still holding strong. Worth every cent. Theyre cute and low on the floor for those younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: So far i like the bed. Seems really sturdy. I'm 5-11 and I fit perfectly in the bed. I have it due to the small room that I sleeping... it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alanis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedframes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these fine bedframes, one for each grandchild. My son & I assembled them together. The first seemingly took forever, but the 2nd was much less time consuming. I will say that the instructions say to use only a hand screwdriver to assemble. I got out my cordless drill/screwgun & made the job much easier w/ no damage at all. Good sturdy product!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This required some time to put together, but the instructions provided and materials made it easy to assemble. It is very attractive for the price and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: ... our two younger boys' room and it was a perfect choice. While it's not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our two younger boys' room and it was a perfect choice. While it's not the greatest quality, it is better than I expected for the money. Even with 3 space case screw ups I was able to assemble it in a hour and forty minutes by myself.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenDesolation

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this please don’t waste your money the wood is very thin and cheaply made! I’m only being 100% honest. I ordered 2 beds one was broke upon arrival and then next one broke down about 2 weeks after receiving, I tried contacting them for a refund they NEVER responded
customer_reviews.author: Miranda spears

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Using it for 2.5 yr old tall child, who has no problem getting in/out of the bed. Great height, nice quality product. I highly recommend. Easy instructions.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed!!! It was surprisingly heavy and sturdy! It looks amazing and my son loves it. However, be prepared to spend a couple hours putting it together. It came in 24 pieces and approximately 170-180 screws.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for toddler or young kids.
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest thing i have put together in a while. The instructions were very easy to follow, and well detailed. The look is nice and it seems well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a young child
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy! Took my husband 2 1/2 hours to assemble this bed, very low to the ground.... looks super nice and my son (4yr) loves his big boy bed (probably not a good purchase for a teenager)
customer_reviews.author: ashley chance

customer_reviews.title: It came with easy instructions and the setup was relatively painless
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our three year old as his first big boy bed. It came with easy instructions and the setup was relatively painless. The bed looks good in his room and our son likes his bed. The price also is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed is very cute for my toddler. It did chip on some parts when putting together. Wood is cheap so it’s good for a start and you get what you pay for. But overall it’s an ok bed.
customer_reviews.author: The James Family

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Not very sturdy, but ok for a toddler bed
customer_reviews.author: Renae Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bed for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Feels very sturdy, installation only took a few hours. Bought this for my toddler and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material / not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 years old and has been using the bed just about 3 months. The entire base of the bed is made from particle board. This week the bed sank in. All the particle board was cracked and broken. I requested a refund and was denied by the seller. Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much!! It was easy to put together, and only took about 2 hrs in total to make! Its a perfect size for one kid.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sets up very easy with instructions. Very happy with the three I purchased. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: David Howard

customer_reviews.title: Boys love it
customer_reviews.text: We had bunk beds for the boys but they never slept in them so we got them these and they love them. Very easy to assemble and it seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kflynn82

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation has arrived too early my baby love it so much thank you 🙂🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my three year old. Once it arrived the box was already damaged. Then as we was trying to put it together, board kept breaking. It’s not sturdy at all. When a wild three year old this would have never lasted. Once the board started breaking, we said we are sending it back! I highly don’t recommend buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but this was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this was very easy to put together. My husband and I did in the time it took to watch a movie. Instructions were spot on and very sturdy when done.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen D. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for his room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for his room. My wife and I put it together and he slept like a little prince. Easy directions and it comes with the screws. You just need the tools. 5 stars for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Richardson

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: More than i expected, easy to assemble, solid, sturdy and quality product
customer_reviews.author: walt anderson

customer_reviews.title: You are better off going to IKEA
customer_reviews.text: It Cana apart after 3 months of used. And this is for my 4 yr old. You are better off going to IKEA
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great bed
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect! I assembled it by myself. I didn’t expect everything to be so heavy, but it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: my kid loves it - he is 5 and its the perfect size for him. Will be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gulpana

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, bought this for my 5 year old son and he loves i! It looks great and was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Bed was REALLY easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bed was REALLY easy to put together! Great starting bed for our 3 year old who likes to roll around a lot in his sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsii

customer_reviews.title: Screws doesn’t stay in
customer_reviews.text: It would be a good bed for my 5year old if the screws were long enough and would keep the legs on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, lots of pieces
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his bed. It took me about 4-5 hrs to assemble alone.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed bought it for our 5 year old son it took some time to put together but once it was finished it looked great, The instructions were very easy to understand sturdy but make sure you move it with two people or put it together where you want it to sit because it's a very heavy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bed lasted a little over a year and broke while I was moving it. I don’t recommend buying this. Ever. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kacher

customer_reviews.title: 134 screws to screw, horrible
customer_reviews.text: Dislike how long it took and the amount of pieces to put together. Overall sturdy bed and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed for kids and even adults can sleep peacefully
customer_reviews.author: SHILPI MAKHIJA

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was leery. And even tho the bed is all MDF board, it looks great assembled. Instr
customer_reviews.author: Andi Norwich

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed with the color don't believe that was really a ...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with the color don't believe that was really a cherry finish. And they can use better markings on the pinholes to tell you which side is up or down when you go to mount the plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy. But works just like I expect. Be handy at assembling
customer_reviews.author: AMA CUST

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Great company to deal with, if you have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed for the price very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Assembly was very easy too
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Toddler's First Real Bed - Fast Shipping Too!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 year old son loves his new bed. Bed is very heavy and seems very sturdy. It does come in a lot of pieces but the directions to assemble are very good so if you follow those you shouldn't haven any problems. Great price and very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it did just right for my six years old son
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sits alittle low but is very nice. Son likes it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible it broke while I was trying to assemble it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Put it together pretty easily with my 11 year old daughter
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality press board
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality press board. Of course you expect pressboard at this price but it flakes apart easily more so than other particle board I have seen. I have renforced with solid wood in key areas so it will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bed for my 9 yr old son! I slept in it once and I'm 6'4.. Great piece
customer_reviews.author: chris m

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Finish is nice and easy to put together. Took about 35 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: josh mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is good for the price. Pros: Overall the bed frame is sturdy, and it looks nice. We had no trouble putting it together. Cons: The only thing I really didn't like was the flimsy particle board pieces that make up most of the headboard. I have a feeling those will be broken before long.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R

customer_reviews.title: Feed up
customer_reviews.text: Why does it say engineered wood when it's press board? Never again what a waste of money. SHOULDN'T EVEN HAVE A STAR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bed easy to put together kid loves it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: This bed comes in a billion pieces that you have ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed comes in a billion pieces that you have to put together. It's very time consuming, and you have to make sure you put it together very well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. My 3 yo loves it...great for a guest room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Adame

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but flimsy particle board bed.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy but quite flimsy bed with very clear instructions to assemble. However the finishing is not very good, especially on the edges of the headboard. Much better than the IKEA beds though which I returned and bought this one. Instructions says dont use power tools, however a drill with toque set to minimum would be absolutely necessary to finish this bed in a reasonable time. Also I use a lot of wood glue on every joint to ensure it says strong and does not disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: Rz

customer_reviews.title: This looks cheap but I think it is ok for ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks cheap but I think it is ok for this price. It is suitable for younger kids and dont think adults can use this bed
customer_reviews.author: CmR

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Leg broke off when moving very easily. Should not happen for what I paid for this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bed but I didn't think it would mostly be made of plywood
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Blue

customer_reviews.title: Beds where not good. I bought 2 of them and one was ...
customer_reviews.text: Beds where not good. I bought 2 of them and one was broken and the other one was not sturdy after it was built. The good thing is that I had no issues with returning them and getting my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I thought I could put it together like I did my dining room table
customer_reviews.text: I missed whether it offered assembly, so I thought I could put it together like I did my dining room table, two other dressers, a chest, and a wall unit. Now I have wood everywhere and need to schedule assembly. Probably my bad
customer_reviews.author: Colette Day

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought or what it looked in the picture. Pain in the neck to assemble, looks and feels cheap. If they posted more pictures with details, I would have never purchased it. Super heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: my son had great difficulty putting it together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson, my son had great difficulty putting it together, and it appeared dependent on one screw for strength. It wasn't wood, but particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Vernon Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy & a lot of pieces to put together. The instructions were extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Redmond Proud

customer_reviews.title: What A Pice of Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: First, no directions, just a ton of pieces of wood. I downloaded the directions from the web. Step one, get the four pieces labeled H2. Only 3 in the box. It would be impossible to get all this back I to the flimsy box it came in and return it. It was practically falling apart when it was delivered. To the dumpster with this junk and I'm out my money.
customer_reviews.author: James Nau

customer_reviews.title: Do not like
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart the first year my son had it. The wood is like pressed wood really cheap, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

product_meta.title: Sauder Parklane Twin Platform Bed with Headboard, Cinnamon Cherry - Guestroom Children's Bedroom Bed Set for Relaxed Sleeping - Engineered Wood Construction
product_meta.description: The Sauder Parklane Twin Platform Bed with Headboard, Cinnamon Cherry is a good choice for a child's or guest bedroom with limited space. Made of engineered wood, the child platform bed features a cinnamon cherry finish for a sleek and modern look. The bed contains an integrated headboard. It fits most Twin-size mattresses and does not require a box spring. The mattress is not included with this Sauder Parklane Twin Platform Bed. Sauder Parklane Twin Platform Bed with Headboard, Cinnamon Cherry: Cinnamon Cherry finish Engineered wood construction Fits most twin-size mattresses Integrated headboard Box spring not required Mattress and box spring sold separately Arrives in 1 box Assembly required 1-year warranty Model# 414129 Twin size bed (assembled): 76.378"W x 41.024"D x 33.307"H
feature_bullets: The Sauder Parklane Twin Platform Bed with Headboard, Cinnamon Cherry is a good choice for a child's or guest bedroom with limited space. Made of engineered wood, the child platform bed features a cinnamon cherry finish for a sleek and modern look.
The bed contains an integrated headboard. It fits most Twin-size mattresses and does not require a box spring. The mattress is not included with this Sauder Parklane Twin Platform Bed.
Cinnamon Cherry finish Engineered wood construction Fits most twin-size mattresses
Integrated headboard Box spring not required Mattress and box spring sold separately Arrives in 1 box
